comment2: `envname` is config variable name used in .env file for the component.
comment3: `namespace` is the registry subdir used by the component.
comment4: If `envname` not given, `name` with underscores will be used.
comment5: If `namespace` not given, `name` with hyphens will be used.
comment6: (Please don't forget to update tests_and_artifacts.json in [concord, daml, ethrpc] folder)
comment7: `libonly` images are only used while building; they won't be pushed for agent's consumption.
name: concord
